Description : TCP/IP SystemVerilog SHUNT b_transport SystemC to SystemVerilog examle  -Target(client)

Target
module automatic Target(
input 
reg 
clk_i
)

TLM-2.0 target implementation for SystemC-to-SystemVerilog communication

This module implements the target side of TLM-2.0 transport protocol over TCP/IP.  It communicates with a SystemC initiator and demonstrates memory read/write operations.

Parameters
clk_i
input reg

Input clock signal

Variables

int clk_cnt

Clock cycle counter
